panels.description: You want this to be as close to 0 as possible. A high value might indicate that the pods are taking too long to process each request.
panels.title: In-Flight Requests (instant)

targets.expr: sum by(code, method, route) (rate(aetherlay_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{code="200"}[5m])) / sum by(code, method, route) (rate(aetherlay_http_request_duration_seconds_count{code="200"}[5m]))
sum by (chain, exported_endpoint) (rate(aetherlay_health_check_total{status="success"}[5m])) / sum by (chain, exported_endpoint) (rate(aetherlay_health_check_total[5m])) * 100

panels.description: You want this to be as close to 0 as possible. A high value might indicate that the pods are taking too long to process each request.
panels.title: In-Flight Requests

panels.description: Allow scrolling down a bit further to avoid issues with the UI when hovering over the last graphs.
panels.title: Empty space
